thread.title: Jocelyn Francoeur
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Jocelyn Francoeur

author: Jocelyn Francoeur
title: Jocelyn Francoeur
text:
Want to share what kind of service Bangood give to their costomers.
Alamost all my orders arrived in a fairly shot time in Québec Canada.
Their products give you more than what you pay for. An they stand by you.
I got a problem with my last order. the order was split in 4 different shipping, they sipped me the 4 sub orders, and i recived just one. I e-mail them about the problem and they right away resend me the 3 missing orders. This is a fabulous service.
Thank you Banggood
